Posts.Title: 45 y/o male with a lump sjloftin VickiTN

Posts.Content: sjloftin wrote: Hey Ya'll, I posted awhile back and wanted to give the group an update. I met with a surgeon today and got an ultrasound etc. He says it's a cyst and that men who have a history of benign brain tumors are at risk...wild. Here's my question. He says the lump will respond to vitamin E? Has anyone heard of this therapy? jOe Log in to post a reply
